sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --prefix=$GNOME_PREFIX: This is the Base installation for GNOME from which all future installations will receive their prefix parameter. Be sure that GNOME_PREFIX is set for this install or globally to your install directory as described in the introduction of this Section.
--sysconfdir=/etc/gnome: This switch puts configuration files in /etc/gnome instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/etc.
